articles.title: Live Putin gas cutoff will send European oil demand soaring – live updates - The Telegraph
articles.description: Oil giants including Saudi Arabia will be boosted by a rise in European oil demand as Vladimir Putin shuts off the continent’s gas taps, experts have warned.
